Camera_and_Style_001_ZoomIN.png:
# Scene needs to be "class MyExample(ZoomedScene)"
self.camera.frame.scale(0.6)
Camera_and_Style_002_ZoomOUT.png:
# Scene needs to be "class MyExample(ZoomedScene)"
self.camera.frame.scale(1.2)
Camera_and_Style_003_CameraLEFT.png:
# Scene needs to be "class MyExample(ZoomedScene)"
self.camera.frame.shift(LEFT*0.5)
Camera_and_Style_004_CameraUP.png:
# Scene needs to be "class MyExample(ZoomedScene)"
self.camera.frame.shift(UP*0.4)
Camera_and_Style_006_SurroundingRectangl:
inner = Tex(r"\textbf{Hello}", color=WHITE)
mob = SurroundingRectangle(inner, corner_radius=0.1)
Camera_and_Style_008_Polygon_set_color.p:
mob = Polygon([-1, .5, 0], [-.5, 2, 0], [1, 2, 0], [1.5, .5, 0], [.25, -.5, 0])
mob.set_fill(opacity=.5)
mob.set_color([TEAL, RED, YELLOW])
mob.set_stroke(width=8)
mob.move_to(ORIGIN)
